title: Communicating Hierarchical State Machines
venue: International Colloquium on Automata, Languages and Programming

tldr.text: This paper presents a comprehensive set of results characterizing the complexity of the reachability, emptiness and universality problems, the simplicity of the language inclusion and equivalence problems, and the succinctness relationships between different types of machines.
